name: Adrift: First Contact
description: Humanity has had its first contact with alien life, and they're hostile. As the sole survivor of a mining expedition to an asteroid belt you must repair your hyperdrive and escape to warn Earth of this new threat. Your systems are damaged, you're leaking fuel, and the ore hauler you're piloting has no weapons unless you count your tractor beam. Fling yourself between asteroids to travel and evade enemies while sending them crashing to their doom. Good luck, Captain.
